mean_cn: n.常规；例行公事；一套固定舞步（或动作）；  adj.例行的，惯例的
mean_en: the normal order and way in which you regularly do things; a situation in which life is boring because things are always done in the same way
sentence: Going to school and reading books are parts of her daily routine.
sentence_trans: 上学和看书是她日常生活的一部分。
word_etyma: rout(e)路线 + ine形容词后缀 → 路线设置好的 → routine常规的，例行的
